verses.verse: A Psalm of praise; of David. I will <S%H7311>extol<s%> <S%H430>thee<s%>, my God, O <S%H4428>King<s%>; And I will <S%H1288>bless<s%> thy <S%H8034>name<s%> for <S%H5703>ever<s%> and <S%H5703>ever<s%>.
Every <S%H3117>day<s%> will I <S%H1288>bless<s%> <S%H1984>thee<s%>; And I will praise thy <S%H8034>name<s%> for <S%H5769>ever<s%> and <S%H5703>ever<s%>.
Great <S%H1419><s%> is <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>, and <S%H3966>greatly<s%> to be <S%H1984>praised<s%>; And his <S%H1420>greatness<s%> is <S%H2714>unsearchable<s%>.
One <S%H1755><s%> <S%H1755>generation<s%> shall <S%H7623>laud<s%> thy <S%H4639>works<s%> to <S%H5046>another<s%>, And shall declare thy mighty <S%H1369>acts<s%>.
Of the <S%H3519>glorious<s%> <S%H3519>majesty<s%> of thine <S%H1926>honor<s%>, And of thy <S%H6381>wondrous<s%> <S%H1697>works<s%>, will I <S%H7878>meditate<s%>.
And men shall <S%H559>speak<s%> of the <S%H5807>might<s%> of thy terrible <S%H3372>acts<s%>; And I will <S%H5608>declare<s%> thy <S%H1420>greatness<s%>.
They shall <S%H5042>utter<s%> the <S%H2143>memory<s%> of thy <S%H7227>great<s%> <S%H2898>goodness<s%>, And shall <S%H7442>sing<s%> of thy <S%H6666>righteousness<s%>.
Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> is <S%H2587>gracious<s%>, and <S%H7349>merciful<s%>; <S%H750>Slow<s%> to <S%H639>anger<s%>, and of <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H2617>lovingkindness<s%>.
Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> is <S%H2896>good<s%> to <S%H7356>all<s%>; And his tender mercies are over all his <S%H4639>works<s%>.
All thy <S%H4639>works<s%> shall give <S%H3034>thanks<s%> unto <S%H3068>thee<s%>, O Jehovah; And thy <S%H2623>saints<s%> shall bless <S%H1288>thee<s%>.
They shall <S%H559>speak<s%> of the <S%H3519>glory<s%> of thy <S%H4438>kingdom<s%>, And <S%H1696>talk<s%> of thy <S%H1369>power<s%>;
To make <S%H3045>known<s%> to the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H120>men<s%> his mighty <S%H1369>acts<s%>, And the <S%H3519>glory<s%> of the <S%H3519>majesty<s%> of his <S%H4438>kingdom<s%>.
Thy <S%H4438>kingdom<s%> is an <S%H5769>everlasting<s%> <S%H4438>kingdom<s%>, And thy <S%H4475>dominion<s%> endureth throughout <S%H1755>all<s%> <S%H1755>generations<s%>.
Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> <S%H5564>upholdeth<s%> all that <S%H5307>fall<s%>, And raiseth <S%H2210>up<s%> all those that are bowed <S%H3721>down<s%>.
The <S%H5869>eyes<s%> of all <S%H7663>wait<s%> for <S%H5414>thee<s%>; And thou givest them their <S%H400>food<s%> in due <S%H6256>season<s%>.
Thou <S%H6605>openest<s%> thy <S%H3027>hand<s%>, And <S%H7646>satisfiest<s%> the <S%H7522>desire<s%> of every living <S%H2416>thing<s%>.
Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> is <S%H6662>righteous<s%> in all his <S%H1870>ways<s%>, And <S%H2623>gracious<s%> in all his <S%H4639>works<s%>.
Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> is <S%H7138>nigh<s%> unto all them that <S%H7121>call<s%> upon <S%H7121>him<s%>, To all that call upon him in <S%H571>truth<s%>.
He will <S%H6213>fulfil<s%> the <S%H7522>desire<s%> of them that <S%H3373>fear<s%> <S%H8085>him<s%>; He also will hear their <S%H7775>cry<s%> and will save <S%H3467>them<s%>.
Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> <S%H8104>preserveth<s%> all them that <S%H157>love<s%> <S%H7563>him<s%>; But all the wicked will he <S%H8045>destroy<s%>.

My <S%H6310>mouth<s%> shall <S%H1696>speak<s%> the <S%H8416>praise<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>; And let all <S%H1320>flesh<s%> <S%H1288>bless<s%> his <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H8034>name<s%> for <S%H5769>ever<s%> and <S%H5769>ever<s%>.
